title: ONYXcore
author: ONYXcore
created_time: August 26, 2022, 11:05:27 AMLast edit: September 05, 2022, 06:12:10 PM by ONYXcore
content: ONYX is a decentralized peer-to-peer (P2P) digital currency and payment network powered by the open source blockchain protocol [YesPower]. With ONYX, users can pay anyone in the world at the fastest speed in 5 seconds, at the lowest cost compared to other digital assets.The ONYX project emerged as an alternative to Bitcoin given early concerns about Bitcoin's delay in confirming block transactions and rounding errors in halving block rewards. By making minor technical changes to Bitcoin's original source code, ONYX achieves faster transaction speeds, even lower processing fees, and provides the most accurate halving and block total than any other digital asset (including Bitcoin). ONYX was also launched based on the idea proposed by Satoshi Nakamoto himself. We wish you all the best and enjoy this currency.[BlockTime: 5sec | Supply: 1.000.000.000 | Halving: ~10years]Premine 1%: It was carried out on the future exchange listings. A detailed version of the use of PREMINE will be sent to you soon. Please note that it will not be used for profit by our teams! We have a real future for the ONYX project.ðŸŒ WEBSITE: https://onyx.run/ðŸŒ BLOCK EXPLORER: https://explorer.onyx.run/[â› EU POOL: https://pool-eu.onyx.run[â› US POOL: https://pool-us.onyx.run[â› AS POOL: https://pool-as.onyx.runâš ï¸ SOURCE CODE: https://github.com/ONYXcore/onyxðŸ‘› Win64 WALLET: https://github.com/ONYXcore/onyx/releases/download/v1.0.2/onyx-win.zipðŸ‘› Linux Wallet: https://github.com/ONYXcore/onyx/releases/download/v1.0.2/onyx-linux.zip- Â  Â ðŸ–¥ miner: https://github.com/bubasik/cpuminer-opt-yespower- Â  Â ðŸ–¥ mining command: -a yespower -o stratum+tcp://pool-(us/eu/as).onyx.run:(port) -u YOURwallet-> DISCORD: https://onyx.run/discord-> TELEGRAM: https://onyx.run/telegram

It is a bit tricky to find it. URL (difficulty 0.01):stratum+tcp://eu.onyx.run:3031URL (difficulty 0.1):stratum+tcp://eu.onyx.run:3032URL (difficulty 0.2):stratum+tcp://eu.onyx.run:3033URL (difficulty 1):stratum+tcp://eu.onyx.run:3034you can start with the lowest one. It will adjust automatically

comments.author: elmo40
comments.body: First 20 blocks were rewarded 500,000/block to create a single wallet pre-mine of 10M.1% pre-mine.Not mentioned anywhere.Block reward is 2.What is the purpose of burning hydro for this coin? Quick pump&dump? If it reached $1 (as the top holder nickname is called) they will simply dump 10M onto the market and slam the price to the ground.IF it will ever reach $1, that is. And, if they don't get impatient with the 0.001 price holding steady for 5 years and then decide to dump to make any kind of payback.Enjoy, folks.
